user.rawDescription: 🏳️‍⚧️🏴 Anarchist • Trans • Guns • Weeb • Not a victim • XY & never claimed otherwise • I love Stirner, Jung, axolotls, @warwallaby & @bogdogwow 🏴☃️

rawContent:
Lol. It’s no longer the trans allies that are going after me hardest. Every time I look at twitter I’m getting called a pedo, a groomer and warned about the wood chipper. It’s kind of shocking and really upsetting. I’m not going to give in and leave twitter but it’s to the point now where Twitter is just upsetting and depressing. I’m not sure how so many ppl are capable of hating me so viscerally. I try so hard to be polite. 

Nor do I hide from reality and my relevance to the trans movement. I have worked so hard to do what I can to undermine the bullshit the prog left is doing. I’ve been swatted, sent death threats…and that’s not even the worst fall out I (and @warwallaby) have experienced in the last two years. I won’t say what it is here bc I don’t want to validate it or give anyone ideas…but telling me I’m guilty of what happens to ppl’s children is fucking too far. I can’t do anymore. I’ve put my life and everything else on the line by standing against this the way that I have…I’ve genuinely spent the last year in fear. 

I just can’t do any more. 

But oh well. I’ll prolly be on twitter a bit less going forward…this is becoming overwhelming and upsetting. I won’t give up, tho. 

Whatever.
